name: UComboBoxKey
doc:
The combobox allows you to display a list of options to the user in a dropdown menu for them to select one.
Use OnGenerateConentWidgetEvent to return a custom built widget.

ForegroundColor: The foreground color to pass through the hierarchy.
MaxListHeight: The max height of the combobox list that opens
bHasDownArrow:
When false, the down arrow is not generated and it is up to the API consumer
to make their own visual hint that this is a drop down.
bEnableGamepadNavigationMode:
When false, directional keys will change the selection. When true, ComboBox
must be activated and will only capture arrow input while activated.
bIsFocusable: When true, allows the combo box to receive keyboard focus
OnGenerateContentWidget: Called when the widget is needed for the content.
OnGenerateItemWidget: Called when the widget is needed for the item.
OnSelectionChanged: Called when a new item is selected in the combobox.
OnOpening: Called when the combobox is opening

methods.name: AddOption
methods.doc: Add an element to the option list.

methods.name: ClearOptions
methods.doc: Remove all the elements of the option list.

methods.name: RemoveOption
methods.doc: Remove an element to the option list.
